Package org.apache.commons.codec.language.bm

package org.apache.commons.codec.language.bm
Implementation details of the Beider-Morse codec.
  • Related Packages

    Description

    Language and phonetic encoders.

    Encodes strings into their Beider-Morse phonetic encoding.
